title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from South Gippsland
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Gippsland (Vic.) - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Victoria - Rural conditions
abstract: Twelve stories, set in three different towns situated in the South Gippsland region.
description: Twelve stories, set in three different towns situated in the South Gippsland region. Comprises of interviews and stories about the townspeople of Meeniyan, Bena, Loch, Poowong, Nyora, Mirboo North and Mount Best. It looks at their past, daily lives and the things that bind these small communities together.
